name: Power Roulette
description:
In Power Roulette, you are the only survivor on the planet and you found a tank to defend yourself from a horde of zombies.

You will get random power-ups to help you.

Wait, did I say "help you" ? Well, not everytime.

You can play the game with your mouse and WASD or Up, Left, Down, Right.

Game Designer : Marcus DO REGO

Game Programmer : Siméon MALARET
